events.title: Hackathon 2025 1
events.description: Join us for a 24-hour coding marathon where innovation meets technology. Build, create, and compete with the best minds in the field.
events.longDescription: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. rules: Rule 1: Teams must consist of 2-4 members
Rule 2: All code must be written during the hackathon
Rule 3: Use of open source libraries is allowed
Rule 4: Projects must be original work
Rule 5: Submission deadline is strict
Rule 6: Code must be pushed to GitHub
Rule 7: Live presentation is mandatory

events.title: Robotics Workshop 1
events.description: Hands-on workshop on building and programming robots. Perfect for beginners and intermediate enthusiasts.
events.longDescription: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. rules: Rule 1: Basic knowledge of electronics required
Rule 2: All materials will be provided
Rule 3: Participants must bring their laptops
Rule 4: Follow safety protocols
Rule 5: No prior robotics experience needed
Rule 6: Attendance is mandatory
Rule 7: Group work is encouraged
